I think I have just the right heist movie for you! Have you seen "Takers"? It's an action-packed thrill ride with a talented cast, including Matt Dillon and Paul Walker. The plot is full of twists and turns as a group of bank robbers try to outsmart a hard-boiled detective.

If you're in the mood for something a bit different, I'd also recommend "Snitch". Dwayne Johnson stars alongside Nadine Velazquez and Harold Perrineau in this gripping drama that explores the high-stakes world of jewelry heists.
